short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your chrome browser into a Travel Inspiration with Beautifull Destination photos and amazing flight tickets prices
short.ru: Вдохновляющие фото мест и цены на авиабилеты, чтобы добраться туда

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is the NewedenTravel Inspiration Tab:

NewedenTravel Inspiration Tab is an inspiring extension for those who love travelling and are always looking for new countries to visit. Or perhaps it’s for those who are so tired of work that they choose a random point in the globe.

There is often little time to carefully pick a travel destination. NewedenTravel Inspiration Tab shows photos of beautiful destinations around the world on your Chrome startup page and the minimum price of round-trip flight tickets from your current location city in the lower left side of your screen. By clicking on the “Price” button, you’ll open the price calendar.

Then, you choose a month, and we will take you to the NewedenTravel Flights Page to review and Book a flight. By clicking on the “More Inspirations” button in the top right corner, you will be able to refresh the page to see more Inspiring locations and Super Deals on Flights. (The page will also automatically reload a new Travel Inspiration Destination every 30 minutes.) Also, the settings of the NewedenTravel Inspiration Tab allows you to change your departure city, currency, language, and exclude some cities from the search and remove reviews and tags from the screen.

On the bottom right side of the screen we also show you some great travel articles from the NewedenTravel Travel-Blog to inspire you even more to get out and travel the world.

Ready to be Inspired with some Fantastic Travel Destinations?

Install the NewedenTravel Inspiration Tab Now and get Inspired.
